title: mapping
markdownDescription: The `mapping` character filter applies user-specified normalization mappings to characters. It is based on Lucene's [MappingCharFilter](https://lucene.apache.org/core/8_0_0/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/charfilter/MappingCharFilter.html).

type.markdownDescription: Human-readable label that identifies this character filter type. Value must be `mapping`
type.description: Human-readable label that identifies this character filter type.

mappings.markdownDescription: Object that contains a comma-separated list of mappings. A mapping indicates that one character or group of characters should be substituted for another, in the format `<original> : <replacement>`.
